      • changeFileExtension

        public static void changeFileExtension(java.io.File file,
                       java.lang.String extension,
                       flatfileinterface.proxies.Log logObject,
                       com.mendix.systemwideinterfaces.core.IContext context)
        Funtion to rename the argument file by adding a date time stamp to the extension and changing the extension to the argument extension
        Parameters:
        file - the file to be renamed
        extension - the extension to be used in renaming
        logObject - the log object for relating logmessages
        context - the context to be used

      • CreateEntity

        public static void CreateEntity(java.lang.String fullEntityName,
                java.lang.Boolean triggerEvents,
                java.lang.String[] splitarray,
                java.util.List<flatfileinterface.proxies.ColumnDefinition> columnList,
                java.lang.String lineNum,
                com.mendix.systemwideinterfaces.core.IContext context,
                flatfileinterface.proxies.Log logObject)
        Function to create the object defined in the import configuration
        Parameters:
        fullEntityName - the full name of the entity that needs to be created (modulename.entityname)
        triggerEvents - for triggering events on the created entity record
        splitarray - the array containing the strings for the attributes of the entity
        columnList - the definitions of the attributes for the entity
        lineNum - the line number for the log message
        context - the context to be used
        logObject - the log object for relating logmessages

      • CreateLogMessage

        public static void CreateLogMessage(flatfileinterface.proxies.LogMessageType status,
                    java.lang.String message,
                    java.lang.String stackTrace,
                    flatfileinterface.proxies.Log log,
                    java.lang.String lineNum,
                    java.lang.String columnNum,
                    com.mendix.systemwideinterfaces.core.IContext context)
                             throws com.mendix.core.CoreException
        Function to create log messages and associate these to a log object
        Parameters:
        status - the message type
        message - that will be written in the logmessage
        stackTrace - the stack trace to be written in the logmessage
        log - the log object for relating logmessages
        lineNum - the line number for the log message, use -1 if no line number needs to be added
        columnNum - the column number for the log message, use -1 if no column number needs to be added
        context - the context to be used
        Throws:
        com.mendix.core.CoreException
